description: Defines the Event class as a JPA entity representing an event record, including fields like id, name, description, startTime, endTime, location, and category, along with constructors, getters, and setters.

classes.name: Event
classes.description: Entity class representing an event, with properties like id, name, description, startTime, endTime, location, and category, including constructors, getters, and setters.

methods.name: Event()
methods.description: Default constructor for the Event class.

methods.name: Event(Long, String, String, OffsetDateTime, OffsetDateTime, String)
methods.description: Constructor initializing all fields except category, defaults category to OTHER.

methods.name: Event(Long, String, String, OffsetDateTime, OffsetDateTime, String, EventCategory)
methods.description: Constructor initializing all fields, with nullable category defaulting to OTHER.
